00170 inline void 
00171 DrawSettings::reset() 
00172 {
00173    m_color = static_cast<GDUtils::Color::CoolColor>( 0x000000 );
00174    m_lineWidth = 1;
00175    m_style = LINE;
00176 };
00177 
00178 inline void 
00179 DrawSettings::dump()
00180 {
00181    cerr << "color: " << int(m_color) << ", lineWidth: " << m_lineWidth
00182         << ", style: " << int(m_style) << endl;
00183 }
